1d.question: An aircraft's primary source of life comes from:
1d.answer: Pressure differential caused by Bernoulli's Principle
choices: Pressure differential caused by Bernoulli's Principle
The striking of air on the underside of the airfoil

2d.question: Which of the following is NOT a principle airfoil?

4d.question: Angle of attack is based on
4d.answer: The cord line and direction of air striking the airfoil
choices: The cord line and direction of air striking the airfoil
The orientation of the chord line to the horizon
The lower camber and the direction of air striking the airfoil
The cord line and absolute wind direction
